attributes.action: By signing this I agree that messages set out by the government in relation to age restrictions should be made more clear.
attributes.additional_details:
We want the government to make it more clear on the age restrications of certain things.
Being allowed to smoke at 16 but not old enough to buy cigarettes, etc
They can do this by advertising it on TV, putting posters, leaflets around schools.

rejection.details: Could the petition be more specific about what action they want government to do please?  As this covers cigarettes (DH), advertising (DCMS) we are currently unable to persuade one specific government department to publish.
